value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Stacked Bar Chart with Grand Totals

Additionally, at the end of the video we also show how to add a Grand Total for each bar column.    Visit our Site: https://powerbi.tips/

value.title: Basics of DAX Expression in Power BI
value.excerpt: There are a lot of resources about how to use each function. However, you always need to start with learning how the expression language works itself. value.title: Create a subset of the table in Power BI and add calculations using SELECTCOLUMNS DAX Function
